price: Sisi tukasema: Ewe moto! Kuwa baridi na salama kwa Ibrahim!
arabic: قُلۡنَا يَٰنَارُ كُونِي بَرۡدٗا وَسَلَٰمًا عَلَىٰٓ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ
footnotes: Sisi tukaufanya moto ule uwe baridi na salama, hauna madhara yoyote, kwa Ibrahim.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qul'nā yānāru kūnī bardan wasalāman ʿalā ib'rāhīma
